126.scenarioPattern: Unpublish content and check PDP is not available on the site
126.stepPattern: When I wait for response code `404` for `.+?` duration retrying .+? times.*/products/.+
126.description: Published products remain visible on web site even after unpublishing in Contentful

vividus-uri-escape-to-fix.assertionPattern: .*Element by selector .*card-corner.*full has href/src attribute with invalid URL.*
vividus-uri-escape-to-fix.stepPattern: Then all resources by selector `a\[href\],img\[src\]` from .* are valid
vividus-uri-escape-to-fix.description: VIVIDUS resource checker does not support unescaped spaces in URLs e.g. /images/pages/styleguide/card/4bc90d7fde30ac4a16c295340c45958d/Rectangle 14974.png
